TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi PrintQueue extends System.Printing.PrintSystemObject

summary.span: 管理印表機和列印工作。

span.span: Manages printers and print jobs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些屬性物件代表特性的列印佇列公用程式執行的電腦上，但其他項目代表功能或在印表機本身的狀態。Some properties of the object represent characteristics of the print queue utility that runs on the computer, but others represent features or states of the printer itself. 例如，是列印佇列中，特性，但是印表機的屬性。For example, is a characteristic of the print queue, but is a property of the printer. 許多印表機，例如是否需要使用者注意屬性需要傳遞，透過的方式方法，從在印表機本身來物件。Many of the properties of the printer, such as whether it needs user attention, need to be passed, by means of the method, from the printer itself to the object. 這應該對應的屬性之前 () 讀取您的程式。This should be done before the corresponding property () is read by your program. 同樣地，當您的程式變更的一或多個屬性的值時，才物件，變更必須在電腦上撰寫實際的列印佇列公用程式。Similarly, when your program changes the values of one or more properties of a object, the change must be written to the actual print queue utility on the computer. 這樣做與方法。Do this with the method. > [!CAUTION] > 類別內命名空間不支援為 Windows 服務或 ASP.NET 應用程式或服務中使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 嘗試使用這些類別時，這些應用程式類型的其中一個內可能會產生無法預期的問題，例如會受到影響服務的效能和執行階段例外狀況。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果您想要從 Windows Form 應用程式列印，請參閱命名空間。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非佇列已暫停或處於錯誤狀態，工作會到達佇列的上方時，因此這是列印功能。Unless the queue is paused or in an error state, the job prints when it reaches the top of the queue, so this is a printing function. 其他的方式來列印[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]包含方法，可在開啟對話方塊，並多含和方法。Other ways to print in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] include the method, which can be used with or without opening the dialog, and the many and methods of the .

summary.span: 在佇列中插入新 (以一般方式命名) 的列印工作，其內容是 陣列。

span.span: Inserts a new (generically named) print job, whose content is a array, into the queue.

returns.span: ，表示列印工作及其狀態。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來寫入多工緩衝處理檔案，不會自動包含的裝置特定資訊，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)]多工緩衝處理器。Use this method to write device specific information, to a spool file, that is not automatically included by the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] spooler. 當然，您需要知道多工緩衝處理檔案是否[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_emf](~/includes/tlasharptla-emf-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]。Of course, you need to know whether the spool file is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_emf](~/includes/tlasharptla-emf-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]. 如果您想要使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)]，您可以使用類別，而不是此方法。If you prefer to work with the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)], you can use the class instead of this method. 之後已呼叫方法，您必須撰寫陣列屬性所傳回，或沒有列印工作時。After the method has been called, you must write a array to the property of the that is returned by or no print job is created. 這個陣列會是什麼列印如果印表機可運作，且未暫停。This array is what prints if the printer is working and is not paused. > [!CAUTION] > 如果不會關閉與所在的執行緒結束之前呼叫時，則該執行緒結束，因為多工緩衝處理器執行緒無法取得控制項上時，會擲回物件。If the is not closed with before the end of the thread in which is called, then an is thrown when that thread ends because the spooler thread cannot gain control over the object. 列印佇列中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)]，此作業具有 「 列印系統文件 」 的名稱。In the print queue's [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)], the job has the name "Print System Document". 若要為工作指定不同的名稱，使用多載。To give the job a different name, use the overload. 其他的方式來列印[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]包含方法，可在開啟對話方塊，並多含和方法。Other ways to print in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] include the method, which can be used with or without opening the dialog, and the many and methods of the . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用傳送列印佇列的陣列。The following example shows how to use to send a array to a print queue. 此程式碼只能搭配可偵測和列印純文字的印表機。This code only works with printers that can detect and print plain text. 其中部分不能。Some of them cannot. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`fastCopy`是`true`，則必須是印表機[列印概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/printing-overview.md)。If `fastCopy` is `true`, then the printer must be an [Printing Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/printing-overview.md). 如果不是，方法會擲回的例外狀況。If it is not, the method throws an exception. 如果`fastCopy`是`false`，則不需要使用 XPSDrv 印表機。If `fastCopy` is `false`, then it is not necessary to use an XPSDrv printer. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]印表機頁面描述語言，例如 PCL 或 Postscript 轉換正在加入佇列的檔案。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] file being added to the queue is converted to the printer's page description language, such as PCL or Postscript. 不過，這種列印會呼叫[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_com](~/includes/tlasharptla-com-md.md)]。However, this kind of printing makes a call to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_com](~/includes/tlasharptla-com-md.md)]. 呼叫[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_com](~/includes/tla2sharptla-com-md.md)]要求呼叫的執行緒具有單一執行緒 apartment () 而不是多執行緒 apartment ()，這是在預設[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]2.0 和更新版本。The call to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_com](~/includes/tla2sharptla-com-md.md)] requires that the calling thread have a single-threaded apartment () instead of multiple-threaded apartment () which is the default in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] 2.0 and later. (如需執行緒和 apartment 狀態的詳細資訊，請參閱[Managed 與 Unmanaged 執行緒處理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db425c20-4b2f-4433-bf96-76071c7881e5)，和。)有兩種方式執行這項處理：(For more on threading and apartment states, see [Managed and Unmanaged Threading](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db425c20-4b2f-4433-bf96-76071c7881e5), and .) There are two ways of doing this: - 最簡單方式是將加入(也就是"`[System.STAThreadAttribute()]`」) 正上方的應用程式的第一行`Main`方法 (通常是"`static void Main(string[] args)`")。The simplest way is to add the (that is, "`[System.STAThreadAttribute()]`") just above the first line of the application's `Main` method (usually "`static void Main(string[] args)`"). - 如果您需要您`Main`執行緒的 apartment 狀態設定為，您可包含呼叫在個別執行緒的 apartment 狀態設定為 與。If you need your `Main` thread's apartment state to be , you can house the call to in a separate thread whose apartment state is set to with . 下列範例會示範這個第二項技術。The example below illustrates this second technique. > [!NOTE] > 您不能套用以外的任何方法`Main`而且不能使用如`Main`執行緒。You cannot apply the to any method except `Main` and you cannot use for the `Main` thread. 其他的方式來列印[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]包含方法，可在開啟對話方塊，並多含和方法。Other ways to print in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] include the method, which can be used with or without opening the dialog, and the many and methods of the . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用批次列印所有[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]目錄中的檔案。The following example shows how to use to batch print all the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] files in a directory. remarks.format: ## Remarks 許多印表機需要沾周圍的空間邊緣的每個頁面至紙張英吋的四分之一並將它移到印表機。Many printers need up to a quarter of an inch of unprinted space around the edges of each page to grip the paper and move it through the printer. 否則碳粉可能會破壞紙張流程機制。Otherwise toner would foul the paper flow mechanism. 可列印的區域是 「 可做為影像區域 」。The area which can be printed is the "imageable area." 型別沒有公用建構函式。The type has no public constructor. 因此，變數`documentImageableArea`必須宣告並指派給`null`，則只會傳遞給方法。Hence, the variable `documentImageableArea` must be declared and assigned to `null` and only then passed to the method. 這個方法會顯示需要使用者輸入。This method displays a requiring input from the user. 使用者在選取印表機、 紙張大小和方向，並關閉對話方塊之後`documentImageableArea`指向實際的物件和其屬性會初始化。After the user has selected a printer, paper size, and orientation and closed the dialog, `documentImageableArea` points to an actual object and its properties are initialized. 如果使用者取消，或關閉對話方塊，傳回值是`null`。If the user cancels or closes the dialog, the return value is `null`. 因此，傳回的值必須檢查`null`您的應用程式。As a consequence, the return value must be checked for `null` by your application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 許多印表機需要沾周圍的空間邊緣的每個頁面至紙張英吋的四分之一並將它移到印表機。Many printers need up to a quarter of an inch of unprinted space around the edges of each page to grip the paper and move it through the printer. 否則碳粉可能會破壞紙張流程機制。Otherwise toner would foul the paper flow mechanism. 可列印的區域是 「 可做為影像區域 」。The area which can be printed is the "imageable area." 型別沒有公用建構函式。The type has no public constructor. 因此，變數`documentImageableArea`必須宣告並指派給`null`，則只會傳遞給方法。Hence, the variable `documentImageableArea` must be declared and assigned to `null` and only then passed to the method. 這個方法會顯示需要使用者輸入。This method displays a requiring input from the user. 使用者設定其列印工作 （包括選取印表機、 紙張大小、 方向與頁面範圍） 對話方塊。The user configures his print job on the dialog (including selecting a printer, paper size, orientation, and page range). 在關閉對話方塊時`pageRangeSelection`和`pageRange`有值，和`documentImageableArea`指向實際物件其屬性會初始化。When the dialog is closed, `pageRangeSelection` and `pageRange` have values, and `documentImageableArea` points to an actual object whose properties are initialized. 如果使用者取消，或關閉對話方塊，傳回值是`null`。If the user cancels or closes the dialog, the return value is `null`. 因此，傳回的值必須檢查`null`您的應用程式。As a consequence, the return value must be checked for `null` by your application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 參數用來做為基礎建構物件。The parameter is used as the basis on which to construct the object. 例如，假設印表機支援媒體類型 A 和 B 的輸入紙匣 1，而且只支援輸入紙匣 2 的媒體類型 C。For example, suppose the printer supported only media types A and B from input bin 1 and it only supported media type C from input bin 2. 如果`printTicket`參數指定輸入紙匣 1，則傳回的物件會包含所有這三個媒體類型，但它會報告類型 C 做為 「 受限於 」。If the `printTicket` parameter specified input bin 1, then the object that is returned would include all three media types, but it would report type C as "constrained." 如果`printTicket`參數指定輸入紙匣 2，則傳回的物件會包含所有這三個媒體類型，但它會報告類型 A 和 B 做為 「 條件約束。 」If the `printTicket` parameter specified input bin 2, then the object that is returned would include all three media types, but it would report types A and B as "constrained." 請參閱[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)如條件約束的詳細資訊。See the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) for more information on constraints. 如果`printTicket`是`null`、用。If `printTicket` is `null`, the is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 參數作為要建構 XML 的列印功能的基礎。The parameter is used as the basis on which to construct the print capabilities XML. 例如，假設印表機支援媒體類型 A 和 B 的輸入紙匣 1，而且只支援輸入紙匣 2 的媒體類型 C。For example, suppose the printer supported only media types A and B from input bin 1 and it only supported media type C from input bin 2. 如果`printTicket`參數指定輸入紙匣 1，則列印功能傳回的 XML 會包含所有這三個媒體類型，但它會報告類型 C 做為 「 受限於 」。If the `printTicket` parameter specified input bin 1, then the print capabilities XML that is returned would include all three media types, but it would report type C as "constrained." 如果`printTicket`參數指定輸入紙匣 2，然後列印功能傳回的 XML 會包含所有這三個媒體類型，但它會報告類型 A 和 B 做為 「 條件約束。 」If the `printTicket` parameter specified input bin 2, then the print capabilities XML that is returned would include all three media types, but it would report types A and B as "constrained." 請參閱[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)如條件約束的詳細資訊。See the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) for more information on constraints. 如果`printTicket`是`null`、用。If `printTicket` is `null`, the is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會產生可行的 print ticket。也就是沒有要求的列印功能的票證印表機不支援。The method produces a viable print ticket; that is, a ticket that does not request printing features that the printer does not support. 方法首先會驗證針對兩個輸入列印票證[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)。The method first validates the two input print tickets against the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397). 如果其中一個無效，則會擲回例外狀況。If either is invalid, an exception is thrown. 接著會合併兩個的票證。The two tickets are then merged. 如果它們有不同的值在特定屬性然後產生合併的票證一開始會使用值差異票證。If they have different values for a particular property then the resulting merged ticket initially uses the value of the delta ticket. 合併的票證然後會針對實際的印表機功能檢查。The merged ticket is then checked against the actual capabilities of the printer. 如果有的話，票證中的設定不相容於印表機的功能，則印表機驅動程式來使用任何邏輯變更這些設定，它想。If any settings in the ticket are incompatible with the printer's capabilities, then the printer driver changes those settings by using whatever logic it wants. 通常，它會替代設定的使用者或印表機的預設值。Typically, it substitutes the user's or printer's default value for the setting. 替代值的驅動程式的來源並不相同票證來當做`basePrintTicket`，則合併的票證可能會有一些設定不同於這兩個輸入的票證。It the driver's source of substitute values is not the same ticket as `basePrintTicket`, then the merged ticket might have some settings that are different from both of the input tickets. 如果印表機驅動程式已變更任何設定，則會報告此事實屬性。If the printer driver has to change any settings then this fact is reported in the property of the . 合併並驗證根據列印佇列的預設設定，應將`basePrintTicket`至或。To merge and validate based on a print queue’s default settings, you should set `basePrintTicket` to the or the . `deltaPrintTicket`參數可以是`null`的情況下`basePrintTicket`會驗證，檢查的可行性，並傳回，可能的變更。The `deltaPrintTicket` parameter can be `null`, in which case the `basePrintTicket` is validated, checked for viability, and returned, possibly with changes. 使用這個多載的，這兩個`deltaPrintTicket`和中傳回具有工作的整個範圍。With this overload of , both the `deltaPrintTicket` and the in the that is returned have job wide scope. 若要指定不同的範圍，請使用此方法的其他多載。To specify a different scope use the other overload of this method. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個方法來合併兩個列印票證，以及回應傳回。The following example shows how to use this method to merge two print tickets and respond to the that is returned. [!code-csharp[PrintTicketManagment#UsingMergeAndValidate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintTicketManagment/CSharp/printticket.cs#usingmergeandvalidate)] [!code-vb[PrintTicketManagment#UsingMergeAndValidate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintTicketManagment/visualbasic/printticket.vb#usingmergeandvalidate)]

替代值的驅動程式的來源並不相同票證來當做`basePrintTicket`，則合併的票證可能會有一些設定不同於這兩個輸入的票證。It the driver's source of substitute values is not the same ticket as `basePrintTicket`, then the merged ticket might have some settings that are different from both of the input tickets. 如果印表機驅動程式已變更任何設定，則會報告此事實屬性。If the printer driver has to change any settings then this fact is reported in the property of the . `deltaPrintTicket`參數可以是`null`的情況下`basePrintTicket`會驗證，檢查的可行性，並傳回，可能的變更。The `deltaPrintTicket` parameter can be `null`, in which case the `basePrintTicket` is validated, checked for viability, and returned, possibly with changes. 如果`scope`是工作，則在傳回的 print ticket可以包含[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)作業、 文件，以及頁面的前置詞的參數。If the `scope` is a job, then the print ticket returned in the can include [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) parameters with Job, Document, and Page prefixes. 如果`scope`是文件，則在每個作業設定`deltaPrintTicket`會被忽略，並傳回的票證可以包含參數，與文件和頁面的前置詞。If the `scope` is a document, then per-job settings in `deltaPrintTicket` are ignored, and the returned ticket can include parameters with Document and Page prefixes. 如果`scope`是頁面上，則每個作業設定以及個別文件中的設定`deltaPrintTicket`會被忽略，並傳回的票證可以包含頁面前置詞的參數。If the `scope` is a page, then the per-job settings and the per-document settings in `deltaPrintTicket` are ignored, and the summary.span: 取得或設定一天中印表機開始列印工作的最早時間，以午夜 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC，亦稱為格林威治標準時間 (Greenwich Mean Time，GMT)) 之後經過的分鐘數表示。

span.span: The time of day that the printer first becomes available, expressed as the number of minutes after midnight (UTC).

value.span: 最大值為 1439。

span.span: The maximum value is 1439.

value.span: 當使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] [新增印表機精靈] 第一次安裝印表機時，印表機預設為隨時可用，並且此屬性在所有時區均會傳回 0。

span.span: When a printer is first installed by using the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] Add Printer Wizard, the printer defaults to being available all the time, and this property returns 0 in all time zones.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您不是以 UTC 時區為準，您必須加入或減去 60 設定或取得正確的時間的時區的倍數。If you are not in the UTC time zone, you must add or subtract multiples of 60 to set or get the correct time for your time zone. 比方說，如果您是在太平洋時間區域北美洲和日光節約時間為非作用中，則您的當地時間是 8 小時早於 UTC。For example, if you are in the Pacific Time Zone of North America and daylight savings time is not in effect, then your local time is 8 hours earlier than UTC. 若要設定12 AM 時區，您將它設定為上午 8 點 UTC，這是的 480 （= 8 \* 60）。To set to 12 AM in your time zone, you set it to 8 AM UTC, which is 480 (= 8 \* 60). 您也必須記得，時間彙總至零 24 小時後 (也就是; 1439 分鐘之後)。You also must remember that time rolls over to zero after 24 hours (that is; after the 1439th minute). 請將它設定為您的時區中的下午 6 點，您設定它為 2AM UTC，這是的 120 （= 2 \* 60）。To set it to 6 PM in your time zone, you set it to 2 AM UTC, which is 120 (= 2 \* 60). 請參閱， ，和類別，操作方法很有幫助的時區。See , , and classes for helpful time zone manipulating methods. 如果印表機永遠可用，這個屬性會傳回 0 所有時區的時間。If the printer is always available, then this property returns 0 in all time zones. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用這個屬性來判斷印表機是否可在目前的時間。The following example shows how to use this property to determine whether a printer is available at the present time.
